Content.Text:
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm not interested in catching bugs
but as long as we're doing it.
<PAGE>
I'm not going to lose to you, <MYNAME>!
I hope you're ready for this.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. As long as we're at it,
how about a bet?
<PAGE>
Whoever wins the Critter Fest
gets to ask the loser
one thing. Whatever they want.
<PAGE>
This is your chance
to ask me anything, right? But you know
what it means if you lose, yeah?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Haha, what's the matter? It
looks like my little princess is ready
to run. Oh, I'm not going to force you.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>, did you think I'd
say that we ought to cooperate
because we're a married couple?
<PAGE>
If we're a couple, we're opponents in
this contest. I will do my best to
win.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>If you do lose, though,
I'll treat you especially well,
and pamper you for an evening.
<PAGE>
I wonder if you'll try to lose
just to get special treatment...

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Critters crawling around; you can barely
see 'em... Instead of catching them,
doesn't it make you want to squish 'em?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>Crawling around without my permission
right at the edges of my vision...
That really ticks me off!
<PAGE>
I don't care if you're a human or a
bug. That just makes me want to squash
you.
<PAGE>
But I'm an adult,
so I guess I can put up with bugs.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I was a kid, I caught bugs all the
time. I guess I just stopped
at some point.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I don't know
why I gave it up...
I quit without even thinking about it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Anyway, I guess the games you play
as a child are like that;
You just grow out of them at some point.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm really good at catching insects!
Let's do our best together, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I don't like having to compete
with you... But as long as we're
competing, I'm not going to go easy!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Win or lose, 
I'm not going to be sore about it!
Let's both do our best!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Oh, but don't overexert yourself, OK?
If you need to go somewhere that's
dangerous, make sure I'm with you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Focusing so hard on catching bugs
that you fall into a river. I couldn't
stand it if something happened!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I want to give you all my
bugs, <MYNAME>, but I'm not
allowed to do that, am I?
<PAGE>
I don't like having to compete with
you, <MYNAME>. But as long as I am,
let's catch as many bugs as we can.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>And then if one of us wins,
let's celebrate with a big party at
home. Promise!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Catching bugs is fun, isn't it?
I haven't had many chances to do this
since I grew up...
<PAGE>
I get really excited
doing this every now and then!
<PAGE>
As long as we're out here,
let's find some awesome bugs!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm letting the bugs I catch
go free afterwards.
I feel sorry for them.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>.
You're in fine form today.
Let's both do our best.
<PAGE>
Of course, this old guy is going to
give it his all, you know. A halfhearted
effort is an insult to competitors.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When it comes to competing, 
you really shine, 
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I'd be happy
just to watch you out here
having so much fun.
<PAGE>
I think watching you might be more fun
than the competition, <MYNAME>. In any
case, let's both give it our all.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
OK! It's decided, then;
I'm not going to hold back.
<PAGE>
Sometimes, as your husband, I have to
show off a little, so that you
fall in love with me all over again.
<PAGE>
Of course, having said that
I don't plan on losing to you, <MYNAME>.
Are you ready?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Insect catching, huh?
I never thought I'd be chasing bugs
at this age.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I've sort of taken it easy my whole
life, so I'm a bit worried whether
my old bones will be able to handle it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Ouch, I'm going to be sore
when we're finished today.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The trick to catching bugs
is to figure out beforehand
where and when they come out.
<PAGE>
It's a lot more effective
than searching all over
for bugs that might not be there.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Speaking of which, this old guy
isn't just wandering around, you know?
I know exactly where the bugs are...
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Unfortunately, I think my old bones
not being able to keep up the hunt
is going to be the bigger problem.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I have little confidence in gathering
insects, I will do my best to have a
good time with Amir and everyone else.
<PAGE>
Please go easy on me, 
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Do your best today, <MYNAME>!
However, please do make sure not
to injure yourself with overexertion.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>If anything were to happen to you,
<MYNAME>, I wouldn't be able to think of
catching bugs, Amir, or anything else.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>If you come across a dangerous
situation, by all means,
call me and I will come.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>As your boyfriend,
I must do my utmost
to protect you.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I would most like to be close to you
in order to render assistance... But
you would not approve of that, correct?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Heheh, I certainly do
understand the way you think.
After all, I am your husband.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>In that case,
I will strive to be
a worthy opponent for you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Let's give it our all,
alongside each other, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When Amir was young, I often
waited upon him as he was catching bugs.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>The Prince is quite accomplished
at catching bugs.
<PAGE>
It isn't unthinkable that we might
win at the Critter Fest, as well.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I am not completely in favor of
chasing bugs. I feel sorry every
time a living thing is captured.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>More than anything else,
I am particularly indifferent to the
look of bugs and the way they squirm.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I have no compunctions about
viewing them from afar, but if possible
I prefer not to have to touch them.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Bug catching, huh? What a pain...
Eh, whatever, I'll do it. You
shouldn't get into it too much either.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm not really into it. You... Hmm...
What's the word? Get totally wrapped
up in whatever you do, don't you?
<PAGE>
When I see how fired up you are,
I start thinking maybe I shouldn't
complain so much, huh?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>All right then, let's do it!
Okay then, <MYNAME>.
Let's see who's going to win.
<PAGE>
Now that I'm into it,
I'm not going to go easy, even on you!
Let's do this thing!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Chasing bugs is fine,
but don't get too carried away, OK?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>It's cool to get into things, but
as soon as I let you out of my sight,
you're off getting hurt somewhere.
<PAGE>
Isn't it just like you to go chasing
'em and trip, or fall into a river?
I'm mad at you or anything.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Nah, I'm... worried about you.
I don't want you getting hurt
someplace off in the woods.
<PAGE>
Oh, whatever, just don't get hurt!
That's all I'm saying'.　Got that?
Then stop grinning and say something!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT>
Hmm?　What?
It sounds like I hate catching bugs?
<PAGE>
Nah, it's not like I hate it or
anything. It's just a pain,
that's all.
<PAGE>
Like, those frantically flapping fellers
flying all over the place...
I can't get my hands on 'em!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...I mean...Seeing who can have
the dirtiest hands the longest?
I'm not into that kind of competition.
<PAGE>
After all,
we're not trying to catch the flies
that are attracted to our filthy hands.
<PAGE>
I usually feel
kind of sorry for the creatures
in contests like this.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
All right, <MYNAME>.
Let's both do our best!
No regrets.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You look pretty good at this, <MYNAME>,
but I don't plan on losing. Let's both
give it everything we've got.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>But don't hurt yourself
chasing after bugs. You can get
pretty carried away sometimes, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>If anything happened to you,
I wouldn't be able to have fun
at the Fest.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I just...want you to remember
that I think you're even more precious
than you give yourself credit for.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Even though it's just one of these
town festivals, it sure does feel weird
to compete against my own wife...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Eh, but that's no reason
to get sore about it.
We're good at letting that stuff go.
<PAGE>
We could even use it as an opportunity
to reaffirm the bonds of our
marriage... At least it's what I think.
<PAGE>
We could talk about our progress today,
about finding where the bugs are,
and help each other out like that.
<PAGE>
That sort of cooperation
wouldn't be against the rules, right?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I was young, I'd take a study break
out in the yard for some fresh air.
I used to catch bugs a lot, back then.
<PAGE>
Back then, Sanjay was always right
by my side...But he really didn't
care for bugs much at all.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>So he always stood three steps back
when I was catching bugs.
<PAGE>
It didn't seem like him at all to do
something like that...so back then,
I used to tease him a lot.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I have been feeling
a distinct lack of exercise lately!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>This Critter Festival is a
marvelous opportunity to make up for
days of inactivity.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
All right!　Let's do it!!
You do your best too, <MYNAME>!
Let's catch a lot of bugs, together!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>!
Let's both do our best!
<PAGE>
Of course, no holding back
between couples!
<PAGE>
Those who don't give it their best get
a poke in the forehead! Forehead poke

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, let's do our best
to catch those critters!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>But you still have to come home
and not just stay out all day
catching bugs!
<PAGE>
You'd lose your credentials as a
husband! If that sort of thing were
to happen, I would be mad?!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Grasshoppers jump around a lot
so be careful when you're chasing them!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>They'll hook you, and lead you on
and then you have to jump to catch them.
But you can catch a lot like that!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
At the Critter Fest, it only
matters how many you catch, right?
<PAGE>
If so, you can avoid the bugs you don't
like, and just catch other ones!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>If the winner was decided based on
what kind of bugs you caught, there'd
be a lot of angry people out there.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm, I wonder if I'll be able to
catch a lot. <MYNAME>,
let me know if you have any tricks.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Do your best, <MYNAME>!
Remember, I'll be
rooting for you!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Huh? Me? Of course I'm going
to do my best, too...But I bet I don't
stand a chance of winning.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>So I'll be happy
if you win for me, too
<MYNAME><RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Let's both do our best.
We're here, after all.
Let's go for a win!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>But don't get so caught up catching
bugs that it gets really late and you
don't come home... That'd be no good.
<PAGE>
What's more important, me or bugs?
I wouldn't ever
make you answer a question like that.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>You understand, right?
OK, see you later!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh... I bet my bug-catching clothes are
going to get just filthy, aren't they.
<PAGE>
I have to be careful
not to wear my good clothes
when I go bug catching.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
As long as I'm catching bugs,
I wonder if I can
use them for my magic!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>For example... Oh, I know! Magic
where, you know, a whole bunch of
beautiful butterflies comes out of a box
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I've done it with birds before...
I wonder if bugs would work.
OK, I'm going to give it a shot!

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's do our best...catching bugs...
I wonder if...I'll catch a lot...
I really do...hope so...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>...
Let's do our best...catching bugs...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Oh yeah...and also...
If it's um...OK with you...
Can we catch them...together...?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Oh...no...it's nothing.
Don't worry about it...
Let's do our best... See you later...
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>...
...
...ohhhh.
<PAGE>
I wanted to catch bugs together...
But I bet...my heart...
might just explode... That's no good...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Husband and wife... It's still a
competition... Let's do our best...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>But, <MYNAME>...
Don't go...too crazy...
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>If you get home too late...
Or if you were to get hurt...
I'd be really sad...
<PAGE>
So...don't let it get too late...
and take care out there...
Promise me, OK?......

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's summer, so...
At night
you can catch...fireflies...
<PAGE>
As long as I'm out,
I'll try to catch...
lots...of fireflies...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When you catch bugs...
you can't let them notice you...
<PAGE>
If they notice you...some bugs will ...
fly away somewhere...

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Regardless of the outcome,
let's just give it our all
and not have any regrets.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
How nice it is
to put hard work
into achieving our goals, together.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Competing with you, <MYNAME>
seems a little awkward...
But this is a competition, after all.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>That is to say... Even if we are lovers
I will not go easy on you, and
I hope that you will not go easy on me.
<PAGE>
Let us strive for victory
with respect and honor for our opponents
and without regret at the end.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Let us both strive for a victory.
Though you might be my opponent, <MYNAME>,
I do not plan on easing up on you.
<PAGE>
On the contrary, I plan on fighting
with everything I have. I hope you, too,
will cast off all restraint, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>However... don't get so caught up in
catching bugs that you aren't able to
come home at a reasonable hour.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>If it gets too late, and
you still haven't come home... it's...
That is... I get lonely.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The fact that this town can hold
the Fest, with everyone catching bugs
makes you think how many there are...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>It certainly is proof of how
abundant our natural resources are here.
I think that is absolutely wonderful.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you know any bug-catching tricks,
please do tell me some... 
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>There must be
some kind of trick
to catching bugs, right?
<PAGE>
I don't often have the chance
to participate in such activities,
so I really don't know.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>,
feeling confident today?
Let's get out there and do our best!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'll be cheering for you
with all my might, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
So you should
cheer for me a lot too,
<MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
Let's use the power of our love
to aim for a win
and do our best. <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Let's do our best
to catch a lot of bugs
together, <MYNAME>. <RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Oh! But don't get so into bugs
that you forget about me
and leave me behind.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS><MYNAME>, you're the type
to get so wrapped up in something that
you lose track of what's around you.
<PAGE>
I could imagine you
getting so into bug catching
that you don't come home all day...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>If you leave me by myself all day,
I'm going to eat
all your dinner!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>So you'd better
give me some attention
every now and then, okay? <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Did you know that
in some countries
they use bugs in cooking?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Hmmmm... I want to try it,
but I really don't want to...you know?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Although, if it's a good dish,
I might want to
challenge myself to eat it!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I can't jump very high...
But do you think I'll be able
to catch bugs anyway?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I bet you'd have to jump
to be able to catch
all those butterflies.
<PAGE>
I can't reach them
if they fly up too high...
<PAGE>
Maybe they'll try
flying extra low just for me...

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>! The festival has just begun.
Are you already headed out to catch
bugs? You sure are enthusiastic!
<PAGE>
Well, do your best!
I'll do well enough!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Shall I make a charm that will help
you win?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Not witchcraft, just a little charm.
OK, close your eyes...
Don't open them until I say so, OK?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Oh...!　Hey! Didn't I tell you
not to open your eyes?!
Really, now! Now I don't want to do it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>"Spell be gone! End!" Honestly...
Get going with the bug catching,
or slug catching, whatever...go!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Bug catching is good and all,
but make sure you get home on time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>When you get wrapped up in something,
<MYNAME>,
you lose track of your surroundings.
<PAGE>
I'm afraid you might be so into it
that you stay out all night
and don't come home until morning.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Well, it's not like
I'd be sad at all
if you didn't come home, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>What? You think I'm lying?! If you're
that smart, then do your best to
get home at a reasonable time.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Critter catching, huh? I'm always
out catching critters for my
medicine...
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Honestly, that sounds like a pain.
They tell me magic is not allowed,
but I'll do what I want, thank you.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I believe that there are approximately
100 varieties among the insects that
I am aware of.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Depending on the weather and season
there're bugs you might not run into.
You could catch 'em at the festival.
<PAGE>
It might be as many as 1/3 of the bugs.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>In any case, the competition is
for numbers, not varieties, so I'm sure
you'll be fine.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>,
are you feeling confident today?
<PAGE>
Even if you're not,
don't worry about it!
It's not all about winning, after all.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>The most important thing
is that everyone enjoys the Fest
in whatever form that might take.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I heard there are a lot of young
people living in cities who have
never been out to catch bugs before.
<PAGE>
Luckily, this is a town with a lot of
nature, so we have all sorts of bugs.
<PAGE>
This festival is an opportunity
for young people of today to remember
the importance of experiencing nature.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If it seems like
you aren't seeing many bugs
and can't catch any...
<PAGE>
You might try applying honey to a tree,
then waiting a day.
That might work.
<PAGE>
As long as it doesn't rain, you should
be able to catch at least one bug.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It sure is the season for Critter Fest.
We get to act like children again
and have fun catching bugs.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Catching bugs even at this ripe old age,
I'm amazed at how much fun I'm having.
I forget the time, ran everywhere.
<PAGE>
Camellia gets tired of it. But that's
my instinct, so nothing to be done
about it.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There are some bugs you can only find at
night, so you should keep hunting
even when it gets dark.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Gathering insects... I'm not
that into it, but as long as I'm
doing it, I might as well try to win.
<PAGE>
Let's both do our best
to catch bugs, safely, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT>
This Fest
is great for children, isn't it?!
<PAGE>
They don't get the chance to
participate much in our other events...
<PAGE>
But it's OK to let them
participate in a festival like this.
Hina was so excited this morning.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I think that people who don't hate bugs
are people who haven't seen
what bugs really look like.
<PAGE>
Those inscrutable little eyes,
those scurrying, messy
millions of little legs...
<PAGE>
When I look at them, I can't stand
them. If I weren't here with Hina
I'm sure I wouldn't be here
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>That's why, when we catch some,
we'll use a frying pan, or something to
do it from a distance, then let them go.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Let's do our best, <MYNAME>!
I'm definitely not going to lose today!

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Aren't butterflies beautiful?
They flutter away
on their multicolored wings!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Whenever I'm catching bugs,
I always end up catching
a whole lot of butterflies!

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Sometimes I hunt for bugs with friends,
so I definitely know
where they're all hiding!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Should I tell you, <MYNAME>?
As a special favor for you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Ah, but if you
take a whole bunch,
there might not be any left for me...
<PAGE>
Hmmm, what to do?
Sorry! I don't think I can tell you.
Competition is fierce, isn't it?

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
As long as I'm participating,
I don't plan on losing!
Let's both do our best!

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm going to let go right away
all the bugs that I catch.
<PAGE>
I couldn't possibly raise them all,
and don't you feel sorry for them
being locked up all day?

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Once, a long time ago,
Toni got hooked on collecting insects.
<PAGE>
Now that was tough!
He'd bring home
a specimen box full of bugs, every day.
<PAGE>
I'm a person
who doesn't really mind bugs.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>But that...that was just
a bit of a horror show for me.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm going to catch a bunch of huge,
cool bugs!
<PAGE>
That'll let me win for sure!
I'm not going to lose to you,
